name: Bread, Milk, Eggs
description:
Spike is having their parents over for dinner. Help them pick out groceries for a great meal, while saying hello to the people they know in the store.

This is a short game where you pick up groceries and talk to dinosaurs. There are no wrong answers, and the food changes every time. What will you grab for dinner?

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, E or Spacebar or Enter to interact or talk. Press Escape at any time to quit.

This game was made over the week of 11/22/2020, as the tenth in my deck of many games, where I try to make a game a week, every week, for a year.
